metadata.description: Star Charts static database generated from verse.py

star.name: Sol
star.description: A stable yellow dwarf star providing optimal conditions for new space explorers to learn navigation and basic starship operations.

objects.name: Terra Prime
objects.description: A beautiful Earth-like training world with diverse biomes and friendly inhabitants. Perfect for new explorers to practice planetary scanning and basic diplomacy.

objects.name: Luna
objects.description: A barren but mineral-rich moon serving as a training ground for mining operations and surface exploration.

objects.name: Europa
objects.description: An ice-covered moon with subsurface oceans, used for training in extreme environment operations.

stations.name: Helios Solar Array
stations.description: Solar energy research and power generation
stations.intel_brief: Alliance solar research facility powering Terra Prime.

stations.name: Hermes Refinery
stations.description: Processing rare metals from Mercury mining
stations.intel_brief: Major rare metals processing facility. Competitive pricing on refined materials.

stations.name: Aphrodite Atmospheric Research
stations.intel_brief: Corporate atmospheric research station. Access to advanced chemical compounds.

stations.name: Venus Cloud City
stations.intel_brief: Ethereal spiritual retreat. Peaceful environment for crew rest and contemplation.

stations.name: Terra Station
stations.intel_brief: Alliance communications hub. Real-time tactical updates and fleet coordination available.

stations.name: Luna Shipyards
stations.intel_brief: Alliance ship construction facility. Full shipyard services available.

stations.name: L4 Trading Post
stations.description: Major trading hub and cargo distribution
stations.intel_brief: Major trading hub. Best prices in the system for cargo and commodities.

stations.name: Lunar Mining Consortium
stations.description: Processing lunar resources and rare earth minerals
stations.intel_brief: Major lunar mining consortium. Access to rare earth minerals and mining equipment.

stations.name: Mars Base
stations.description: Main colony on Mars with extensive facilities
stations.intel_brief: Terran Republic Alliance main Mars colony. Full colonial facilities and research labs.

stations.name: Phobos Mining Station
stations.intel_brief: Phobos mining station. Access to asteroid mining and resource trading.

stations.name: Deimos Research Facility
stations.intel_brief: Scientists Consortium research facility. Access to cutting-edge research and analysis.

stations.name: Ceres Outpost
stations.description: Scientific outpost in the asteroid belt
stations.intel_brief: Asteroid belt research outpost. Surveying and analysis of asteroid resources.

stations.name: Vesta Mining Complex
stations.intel_brief: Vesta mining complex. Large-scale asteroid mining and commodity trading.

stations.name: Europa Research Station
stations.intel_brief: Europa subsurface research station. Biological samples and ocean data available.

stations.name: Callisto Defense Platform
stations.intel_brief: Alliance defense platform. Military repairs and security services available.
